n1ck1216 at 2010-02-03 20:39 CET: 

Secret Myth, How do i put your movies into my ps3 and be able to watch it? 


After downloading place it on an External Hard Drive and go to Video on your PS3 and you'll see your External Hard Drive. Hit the Triangle Button on it and go display all. 
Bam your done.
Hitting X is not going to do for you buddy.
